name: itstock-license-server
description: ITStock by Nextendo - License Server API

scripts.generate:license: node -e "const crypto=require('crypto');const chars='ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789';const groups=[];for(let i=0;i<4;i++){let g='';for(let j=0;j<4;j++)g+=chars[Math.floor(Math.random()*chars.length)];groups.push(g);}const base='ITSTOCK-'+groups.join('-');const checksum=crypto.createHash('sha256').update(base).digest('hex').substring(0,4).toUpperCase();console.log(base+'-'+checksum);"

author: Nextendo
